text: Hagi Aisaia'ma Sinakeripinku'ma asamia kemo'ma tamage huno efore hanigenoma kesigura, Hezekaiana amanahu avame ke asmi'ne, meni kafufina hozafima agraragisama hagesia ne'za hamareta nenetma, anante kafufina anampinti'ma rutri hanifinti'ma hageno mrerino raga rentesia ne'za hamareta negahaze. Hianagi nampa 3 kafufina tamagra'a ne'zana krita nenetma, tamagra'a waini hoza antetma raga'a tagitma negahaze.
